headline: Arkestro Announces Customer Expansion With Chevron, Driving Predictive Procurement Transformation Across Global Markets
summary: Arkestro, the leading predictive procurement platform accelerating enterprise scale, today announced the expansion of its adoption within Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX), one of the world's leading integrated energy companies. To date, Chevron has used Arkestro's platform across business units to accelerate supplier cycle times, mitigate cost volatility in sourcing, and gain greater visibility across all types of spend. headline: Is Chevron the Smartest Investment You Can Make Today?
summary: Chevron, facing weak energy prices, has an above-average yield, a long history of dividend increases, and a solid balance sheet.

headline: CVX Seeks Regulatory Review on Venture Global's LNG Project Timeline
summary: Chevron's move to intervene in Venture Global's Plaquemines LNG delay signals deep concern over potential impacts to its long-term gas strategy.

headline: Chevron Wants to Weigh In on the Launch of Venture Global’s New LNG Plant
summary: Chevron has asked regulators to let it weigh in on Venture Global’s request to delay its Plaquemines LNG project to 2027, fearing a repeat of past delivery disputes that left major buyers shortchanged.

raw.headline: Chevron Wants to Weigh In on the Launch of Venture Global’s New LNG Plant
